item.title: By: Jim Whitescarver
item.dc:creator: Jim Whitescarver
item.description: Yes! The evolution of voluntarily trusted currency fits in beautifully with FreeTrust.
item.content:encoded: Yes! The evolution of voluntarily trusted currency fits in beautifully with FreeTrust.

item.title: By: Manfred Karrer
item.dc:creator: Manfred Karrer
item.description: Fits good to: https://ourbasicincome.wordpress.com/2015/06/18/circles-universal-basic-income/ Voluntary assigned trust is very different to obligatory needed trust put into trusted 3rd parties which lead to exploitatation and resource control. Web of Trust vs. CAs.
item.content:encoded:
Fits good to: https://ourbasicincome.wordpress.com/2015/06/18/circles-universal-basic-income/
Voluntary assigned trust is very different to obligatory needed trust put into trusted 3rd parties which lead to exploitatation and resource control. Web of Trust vs. CAs.

item.title: By: Jim Whitescarver
item.dc:creator: Jim Whitescarver
item.description:
Very well put! Thank you.
Yet there is one more thing needed to not be killed by the app. We cannot survive or thrive in a trustless environment with ourselves trusting and being trusted by others. We need to capitalize on trust in a trustless environment. Trust enables collaboration which enables innovation, which enables enterprise, which enables a better quality of life to evolve. FreeTrust.org aims to monitize the real value of trust algorithmecly encouraging trustworty behaviours.
item.content:encoded:
Very well put! Thank you.

Yet there is one more thing needed to not be killed by the app. We cannot survive or thrive in a trustless environment with ourselves trusting and being trusted by others. We need to capitalize on trust in a trustless environment. Trust enables collaboration which enables innovation, which enables enterprise, which enables a better quality of life to evolve. FreeTrust.org aims to monitize the real value of trust algorithmecly encouraging trustworty behaviours.
